parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds/overrides loadout to a vehicle pylon. <tt>TransportPylonsComponent</tt> in vehicle config and <tt>pylonWeapon</tt> in the magazine config are required to run.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''setPylonLoadout''' [pylon, magazine, forced, turret];

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [pylon, magazine, forced, turret] : [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pylon: [[Number]] or [[String]] - pylon index (index starts from 1) or pylon name (see [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] Example 4)
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> magazine: [[String]] - magazine name
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> forced (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to force incompatible magazine. Default: [[false]]
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> turret (Optional): [[Array]] - turret path. Default: []

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] on success

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setPylonLoadout]] ["pylon1", ""]; </code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Make all of your pylon weapons Twin Cannon 30 mm:<code>[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 1 [[to]] 100 [[do]] {
	[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setPylonLoadout]] [_i, "PylonWeapon_300Rnd_20mm_shells", [[true]]];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Showcase all possible magazines:<code>[] [[spawn]] {
	{
		[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 1 [[to]] 100 [[do]] {
			[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setPylonLoadout]] [_i, [[configName]] _x, [[true]]];
		};
		[[hint]] [[configName]] _x;
		[[sleep]] 1.5;
	} [[forEach]] ("[[getText]] (_x >> 'pylonWeapon') != <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>''</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>" [[configClasses]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgMagazines"));
} ;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Vehicle Loadouts]],[[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]],[[getPylonMagazines]],[[setAmmoOnPylon]],[[ammoOnPylon]],[[animatePylon]],[[animateBay]],[[setPylonsPriority]]
</value></part></template>

</dd>
